body: Oh, why yuri? And with such beautifull character who you'll never see in a hetero romance doujin, whyyyyy such beautifull character like this have to be wasted on yuri? Why we cant have beautifull chars like them on normal romance doujin too? I mean, I really would love to see a male there to care for them and make love to them, and love them and they love him back, but....yeah....
It's sad that even the "normal" chapters of this manga are not translated.
恶心恶心恶心恶心恶心
this is a special chapter so it is a normal ecchi manga
If literally having sex and have boobs and pussy showed is still considered ecchi then I'm done with life
Wait, isn't this supposed to be a normal ecchi manga? Why is it here lol
